data.name: AboutUsAplikativen
data.value: Our technical team is well-versed in of today’s major business applications, and have all the resources at hand to get you the result you need. Our analysts have a broad base of experience that comes from working with the applications that drive today’s business.

data.name: AboutUsBrendovi
data.value: Our company is in trend with world brand's.We allways offer you the best solutions directly from the best companies.

data.name: AboutUsObuka
data.value: Upon completion of your software and hardware installation, we provide training and information in all issues so the maximum skill levels can be achieved.

data.name: AboutUsSymbol
data.value: Info Biro is official distributor for Symbol in Republic of Macedonia . We offer barcode scanner, mobile products and info display.

data.name: AboutUsTehnicka
data.value: We stand behind our products. We pride ourselves on our hardware and software knowledge and our ability to communicate that information to you through a highly educated support team.

data.name: AboutUsTim
data.value: Our technical team provides support from pre-sales surveys and engineering, to the design and installation of your computer system, to everyday service and advice months after your system is up and running. We take care of the technical details so you can operate worry-free in a reliable and secure network environment.

data.name: AboutUsVoved
data.value:
Info Biro is an independent Software & Hardware Company, specializes in Point-of-Sale and General Business Information Systems.

Our goal is to provide comprehensive, dependable solutions to our customers.

    We are skilled at designing and delivering complete, turnkey solutions.We do everything for you: we design tech information system, supply the hardware, wire and configure the network, develop and install the system and application software, provide basic training for the end-users and provide comprehensive after-sales support.

data.name: NaslovnaVoved
data.value:
Welcome to our web site - Info Biro
Info Biro i is private company founded in November 1991. Main activities are:
  • Design and development of business applications
  • Design databases
  • Installing and maintenance computer networks
  • Sale of standard and specialized computer equipment
  • Selling operating supplies

data.name: newsPageText
data.value:
Taggy-Price label
Taggy is an innovative wireless system used to update product prices and information in real time, thus abolishing the need for daily chore of correcting traditional paper labels on products displayed.
Taggy-Usage
    Taggy can be used in::
  • Supermarkets
  • Perfume shops
  • Opticians
  • Jewellers
  • Shoe shops
  • Clothes shops
  • Fruit and vegetable shops
  • Phone equipment shops
  • Electric appliances

data.name: SoftwareVoved
data.value:
Programming packages allow formation of a fully integrated Information sistem.So selecting a programming package from the top menu sets the basic features of the standard business programs.
Given that every major company has its own specifics, they will be recorded in detail and will be arranged appropriate solutions.
The organization of our company is characterized by a willingness to change - to podobro.Sekoj of employees invest their knowledge and skills dase find better solutions every day. have at hand all the tools needed to get the results you need. Our analysts have a broad base of experience that comes from working with applications that are leading today's businesses.

data.name: textClients
data.value:
Clients List

We have a "Boss" - The Customer

We are all commited to the personal and commercial success of our customer. He is entitled to good, fast and friendly service from us. We can only be successfull if we can make a considerable longterm contribution. Our own success depends on that.
